name: Black Box Jumper unity
description:
Black Box Jumper is Simple platformer game with Black and White graphics. 

Each level must be finished  in given time which is displayed in top middle of the game.

Black box jumper unity is a remake of my older game Black box jumper that's made with Gamemaker.
There are several changes to the game, but it's still very similar to Black box jumper.

FOUND BUGS: 

  • Forgot to disable full screen toggle because it does nothing right now.
  • Forgot to hide the "Are you sure" window when resetting game progress. Just press no after pressing yes.
LINKS: Youtube Discord
